text: Hi all, I'm Teun, Lead developer of Bureau Bright B.V. located in the Netherlands. We are an inbound marketing agency using HubSpot / WordPress as our CMS. We love using React, ES6, SCSS, Twig, VSC, Git and Gulp. I'm excited to be part of this community and hear about your ideas on HubSpot development. We are currently working on our local HubSpot development stack and would love to hear about your experiences.
:wave: Getting to know HubSpot for a small handful of clients.
